health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Athman Mwamwiri, Hon. Chief Whip (Hon. Kitula), Hon. Kibwana Swaleh, Hon. Kombe Nzai, Hon. Tobias Samba, Hon. Shebe Athman, Hon. Lucy Chizi
health_data_challenges: Lack of youth-friendly health services and facilities to combat drug abuse, spike in youth drug abuse leading to criminal gangs, inadequate rehabilitation centers
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: 1. County government to come up with youth-friendly health services for drug abuse and addiction. 2. Construct at least one rehabilitation center in each Sub-County. 3. Train drug recovery individuals on entrepreneurship skills and provide start-up capital and job opportunities.
